rbKeyForContent - Variable in class graphanalyzer.view.panels.DescriptionPanel
A key for the String stored in the Properties file for the content
rbKeyForTitle - Variable in class graphanalyzer.view.panels.DescriptionPanel
A key for the String stored in the Properties file for the title
readInput(InputStream) - Method in class graphanalyzer.util.io.GraphMLReader
Reads the given inputStream of a GraphML file and initializes the Graph.
requestAlgorithm() - Method in class graphanalyzer.controller.MainController
This method is invoked when a new graph is requested by ControlPanel.startButton and initializes MainController.algRoutine with the chosen algorithm.
requestNewDirectedGraph() - Method in class graphanalyzer.controller.MainController
This method is invoked when a new graph has been chosen in the dialog created by MainMenuBar.itemNew and reads the GraphML file to draw the graph.
requestNewGraph() - Method in class graphanalyzer.controller.MainController
This method is invoked when a new graph is requested by MainMenuBar.itemNew and opens a dialog to choose a new graph.
requestNextStep() - Method in class graphanalyzer.controller.MainController
This method is invoked when a new graph is requested by ControlPanel.nextButton and will invoke the nextStep() method of MainController.algRoutine.
requestPreviousStep() - Method in class graphanalyzer.controller.MainController
This method is invoked when a new graph is requested by graphanalyzer.view.panels.ControlPanel#previousButton and will invoke the previousStep() method of MainController.algRoutine.
resolutionHeight - Variable in class graphanalyzer.controller.settings.EnvironmentProperties
Deprecated.
 
resolutionWidth - Variable in class graphanalyzer.controller.settings.EnvironmentProperties
Deprecated.
 
reverseEdges() - Method in class graphanalyzer.view.panels.GraphPanel
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
("better" solution has been found to display transposed graph at #shouldDrawTransposed())
